mapper.select: SELECT GUID, NUMBERRULEFK, DATASEQ, ITEMTYPE, ITEMVALUE, FIELDTYPE, FIELDCLASSNAME, PARENTGUID, STARTVALUE, ISDATEBYUSER, PREFIX, SUFFIX, FIELDLENGTH, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID, FIELDNAME, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_NUMBER_DETAIL A ORDER BY A.DATASEQ

SELECT GUID, NUMBERRULEFK, DATASEQ, ITEMTYPE, ITEMVALUE, FIELDTYPE, FIELDCLASSNAME, PARENTGUID, STARTVALUE, ISDATEBYUSER, PREFIX, SUFFIX, FIELDLENGTH, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID, FIELDNAME, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_NUMBER_DETAIL A WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CLASS_NUMBER_DETAIL (GUID, NUMBERRULEFK, DATASEQ, ITEMTYPE, ITEMVALUE, FIELDTYPE, FIELDCLASSNAME, PARENTGUID, STARTVALUE, ISDATEBYUSER, PREFIX, SUFFIX, FIELDLENGTH, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID, FIELDNAME, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID ) VALUES(#GUID:VARCHAR#, #NUMBERRULEFK:VARCHAR#, #DATASEQ#, #ITEMTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ITEMVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDCLASSNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PARENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STARTVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISDATEBYUSER:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PREFIX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SUFFIX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDLENGTH#, #CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_CLASS_NUMBER_DETAIL
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, NUMBERRULEFK=#NUMBERRULEFK#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, ITEMTYPE=#ITEMTYPE#, ITEMVALUE=#ITEMVALUE#, FIELDTYPE=#FIELDTYPE#, FIELDCLASSNAME=#FIELDCLASSNAME#, PARENTGUID=#PARENTGUID#, STARTVALUE=#STARTVALUE#, ISDATEBYUSER=#ISDATEBYUSER#, PREFIX=#PREFIX#, SUFFIX=#SUFFIX#, FIELDLENGTH=#FIELDLENGTH#, CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID=#CONTROLLEDNUMBERFIELDGUID#, FIELDNAME=#FIELDNAME#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
